SAB1L.VS.summary: AB Siauliu Bankas provides commercial banking products and services to private and corporate customers in the Republic of Lithuania. Its banking products and services include various bank accounts; term deposits, accumulative deposits, and savings deposits; consumer credits, credit cards, real estate credit, mortgage loans, credits for farmers, and short-term and long-term credits, credits with structural instruments, trade finance, as well as multi-apartment house renovation loans; and payments, cash operations, and payment cards services. The company also provides e-banking, foreign exchange, factoring, and leasing services, as well as other banking services. In addition, it offers investment instruments and transactions, securities trading services, investment funds, life insurance, bonds, reports and recommendations to investors, debt securities quotes, pension accumulation funds, and currency risk management services. Further, the company is involved in the management of real estate properties; investment management business; landscaping services; and development of residential multi-apartments. As of December 31, 2020, it had 59 customer service outlets. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Siauliai, the Republic of Lithuania.
